itunes:title: October Books on the Radar + Book Talk About Seasonal Reading
title: October Books on the Radar + Book Talk About Seasonal Reading
description:
In Episode 19 of Book Talk, Etc. Tina and Renee are talking seasonal reading and sharing October releases they canâ€™t wait to read! They share what they're loving lately, their latest reads, a shelf addition, and have book talk about reading based on the seasons plus October releases they want to make sure get on your radar.

*Support us on Patreon ! We would love for you to join our Book Talk community! We have great bonus episodes, Zoom get togethers, an engaging private Facebook and more for just $5 a month!Â 

Â *The book titles listed are linked to Amazon Affiliates, where we make a small commission from qualifying purchases (at no cost to you). Thanks for your support!
